text: geudeul-i bukkeuleoun il-eul hal ttaemyeon byeonmyeonghayeo malhagil uli josangdeul i geuleohge ham-eul boassseubnida ttohan hananimkkeseo uliege myeonghasa geuleohge hadolog hayeossseubnida lago hani illeogalodoe geuleohji aniham-ila hanannimkkeseoneun bukkeuleoun il-eul myeonglyeonghaji ani hasyeossnola neohuineun neohuiga alji moshaneun geos-eulo hananimkke geo jishalyeo haneunyo
